price: 51. Kuwase u xusul duubta ka hortagga Aayadahayaga, kuwaasi waa ehlu Naarka.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ سَعَوۡاْ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna saʿaw fī āyātinā muʿājizīna ulāika aṣḥābu al-jaḥīmi
